featured.title: AgroSense - Smart Agriculture Advisor
featured.subtitle: AI-Powered PWA for Modern Farming
featured.description: Intelligent agricultural advisory system combining computer vision, machine learning, and real-time data to help farmers optimize crop management and increase yields.
featured.longDescription: AgroSense revolutionizes traditional farming by providing AI-driven insights for crop health monitoring, pest detection, and weather-based recommendations. The application uses CNN models for image analysis, NLP for processing agricultural data, and offline-first architecture for reliable field use.
featured.problem: Farmers in rural areas lack access to real-time agricultural expertise and struggle with crop disease identification, leading to reduced yields and increased pesticide use.
featured.solution: Developed an offline-capable PWA that uses computer vision to identify plant diseases, provides personalized farming recommendations, and delivers weather-based alerts even without internet connectivity.
approach: Conducted field research with local farmers to understand pain points
Trained CNN models on agricultural image datasets for disease detection
Implemented offline-first architecture using PouchDB for data synchronization
Integrated weather APIs and developed predictive algorithms for crop recommendations
Designed mobile-first UI optimized for outdoor use and low-light conditions

challenges.solution: Implemented PouchDB with sync strategies and cached model inference

challenges.challenge: Accurate disease detection across crop varieties
challenges.solution: Created ensemble CNN models and continuous learning pipeline
Designed intuitive camera-first interface with voice guidance

keyFeatures: Real-time crop disease detection using camera

results.impact: Helped 200+ farmers in pilot program improve crop yields by average 23% while reducing pesticide usage by 35%

architecture.ai: Custom CNN models trained on agricultural datasets

featured.title: Store Management System
featured.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Inventory & Sales Platform
featured.description: Comprehensive retail management system with barcode scanning, role-based access control, and real-time inventory tracking built with Python and MySQL.
featured.longDescription: Full-stack enterprise solution for retail businesses featuring advanced inventory management, sales analytics, customer relationship management, and multi-user role-based access. Designed for scalability and real-world business operations.
featured.problem: Small to medium retail businesses struggle with manual inventory tracking, leading to stock discrepancies, lost sales, and inefficient operations.
featured.solution: Built a comprehensive digital solution that automates inventory management, enables barcode scanning for quick product entry, and provides real-time business analytics with role-based access for different staff levels.
approach: Analyzed existing retail workflows and pain points through business interviews
Designed normalized database schema optimized for inventory operations
Implemented secure JWT-based authentication with role-based permissions
Integrated barcode scanning APIs for seamless product management
Created responsive dashboard with real-time analytics and reporting

challenges.solution: Implemented transaction-based inventory updates with audit trails
Used database locking and optimistic concurrency control
Created flexible permission matrix with resource-level access control

keyFeatures: Barcode scanning for product entry and sales

results.impact: Reduced inventory discrepancies by 95% and increased checkout speed by 60% in pilot implementations

featured.title: Todo PWA Redesign
featured.subtitle: Modern Kanban + Calendar Integration
featured.description: Complete redesign and feature enhancement of a Vue.js todo application, transforming it into a unified productivity platform with Kanban boards and calendar integration.
featured.longDescription: Comprehensive overhaul of an existing todo application, introducing modern UI/UX principles, advanced task management features, and seamless integration between list, kanban, and calendar views for enhanced productivity workflows.
featured.problem: The original todo application had limited functionality, poor user experience, and lacked modern productivity features expected by users in 2024.
featured.solution: Completely redesigned the application with modern UI/UX, added Kanban board functionality, calendar integration, and enhanced the PWA capabilities for better mobile experience.
approach: Conducted UX audit of original application to identify pain points
Researched modern productivity app patterns and user expectations
Designed new component architecture with Vue 3 Composition API
Implemented offline-first data persistence with IndexedDB
Created responsive design system with Tailwind CSS

challenges.challenge: Maintaining data integrity during major refactor
challenges.solution: Implemented migration scripts and backward compatibility layers

challenges.challenge: Complex state management across multiple views
challenges.solution: Redesigned Vuex store with modular architecture and computed getters
Built robust sync engine with conflict resolution strategies

results.impact: Transformed a basic todo app into a comprehensive productivity platform with significantly improved user satisfaction and engagement

architecture.frontend: Vue 3 with Composition API and TypeScript
architecture.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom design system
architecture.pwa: Workbox for service worker and caching strategies
